question:
The election of which of the following is held on the basis of proportional representation system in India?
1. President
2. Vice President
3. Members of Rajya Sabha
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The elections of the following are held on the basis of proportional representation system in India: (1) the President, (2) the Vice President, (3) the members of Rajya Sabha and (4) the members of state legislative council.
